thread.title: Kidman stuns in lingerie and talks rough sex scenes
thread.title_full: Kidman stuns in lingerie and talks rough sex scenes

title: Kidman stuns in lingerie and talks rough sex scenes
text:
Nicole Kidman rocks lace lingerie and talks rough sex scenes in Interview magazine NewsComAu Nicole Kidman rocks lace lingerie and talks rough sex scenes in Interview magazine NewsComAu NICOLE Kidman stuns in lace lingerie and talks about rough sex scenes with John Cusack in the latest issue of Interview magazine. 
The 48-year-old rocked a retro look in the photoshoot for the October issue, snapped by photographer Fabien Baron. 
Interviewed by Empire creator Lee Daniels — who directed the Aussie actor in Paperboy — the pair discuss a rather intense love scene that took place in the film. 
“What kills me is that you don’t complain. I don’t know whether that’s a good or bad thing,” Daniels praised the star. 
“I remember the love scene you did with John Cusack. I said, ‘John, you’re hurting her.’ You were bent over the washer and dryer. I said, ‘Nicole, are you OK?’ And you said, ‘I’m fine.’ But it was clear that he was throwing you around the f**king room like a mop. [laughs] And the next day you came to set bruised.” 
Kidman explained that actors don’t want to “humiliate” each other in certain scenes. Other Stories
